extendedInfo.description: There is solar power in any place of our world.Do you want to make use of them?Quick use this spoof solar charging panel to do this. About this app:This app offers you a solar power panel, and you can see it on the main screen of this app.On the top of it, it will show you the voltage and temperature.By clicking Start Charging, you can begin to charge your phone with solar power. (fake)During the charging process, you can see the percentage of the charging power(fake).When the percentage is up to 100 percent, your battery will be full(fake).For your first use, you can see an instruction to show you how to use(fake) this app. The whole charging process is not real, but it will give you a real experience.So if you use this app to fool your friends, he or she will be cheated by it. Conclusion:Though our technology is still not mature in solar power utilization on mobile phone, lots of developers are trying hard to study for this.So we can expect that solar power really can be use to charge our phone directly in the near future.Hope you will love this creative and funny app! ******************************************************Note:1.  This is just a fake app for fun.2.  When you download this free application, you will also download some ad-wares to your phone. These ad-wares will show you some notification ads or icon ads in this app.******************************************************
